review.reviewBody: This is the best restaurant ever. The food is amazing!
The roast lamb was a god sized portion and very tasty.
Very large portions and very tasty souvlaki.
Best pizza! Perrf baked with gener toppings!
Food was unreal and the staff were great. Will be going back again
